ngoList.title: MUMKIN
ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: Activities and Achievement: MUMKIN has executed the following programmes and activities on various occasions through several â€œCultural Programmesâ€ in its targeted locations to sensitize people on various social issues such as Health & Nutrition, Education, Child Labour, Right to Information, Domestic Violence, Women Empowerment AIDS Awareness etc. The AIDS Awareness programme was centered on the groups formed by MUMKIN in the AIDS awareness week in the first week of December. Each day was marked by panchayat level meetings. In each block i.e. Pranpur, Manihari, Mansahi, Dandkhora, Azamnagar, Barari, Balrampur, Barsoi, Baisi, Dhamdaha, B. Kothi, Purnea East, Narpatganj, Forbesganj, Bahadurganj children and women who is helping us in realizing our vision and we look forward to their continued support in the coming years. In Health Related activities Mumkin is working for awareness generation programme for upgrading the Nutritional Status of women and children in the society. Through health camps Mumkin has been identifying the Severe Acute Malnourished children and helping them in referral services. Mother and family members of the malnourished children are given counseling through Mumkin field support team. Mumkin is also active for better coordination between Nutritional Rehabilitation Centre & Community Level government health workers. Mumkin is regularly upgrading its data base for further support the ongoing health programmes by government at community level such as Biannual Vitamin A Supplementation programme, Polio eradication programme, Immunization programme etc. Mumkin has formed several Poshan Rakshak Dal (PRD) at community level for better awareness regarding Importance of good nutritional level among children. With the coordination of Dist. Level govt. departments Mumkin has been engaged for better information dissemination regarding government programmes. Mumkin has organized several Camps at village level for Awareness for Right to Information. Mumkin is supporting youth clubs for generating local leadership qualities in rural youths. Youths have been oriented for the importance of SHGs & use of RTI for greater benefits of programme like MNREGA, IAY, Sarva Siksha Abhiyaan etc.

ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: Muskaan Foundation works for creating awareness in the community concerning their health, hygiene, sanitation and allied basic health related problems of the society. As today, Pneumopnia, Meningitis, Malaria, Dengue, Diarrhoea and other vaccine preventable diseases are the prime reasons of Child Deaths. Muskaan Foundation works as helping hand to root out the barriers and social stigma behind the community regarding health and hygiene by creating awareness in the community and support to Government health programme. Muskaan Foundation makes its efforts towards meaningful & sustainable improvements instead of temporary relief. The aim of Muskaan Foundation is to enable and empower the children to improve their lives and conditions. Therefore, Muskaan Foundationâ€™s projects are focused on planned human and social development instead of random charity.

ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: MUSLIM EDUCATIONAL WELFARE SOCIETY is a Non Governmental organization registered under Society Registration Act; its basic objectives are to work for the rural upliftment of deprived area of this district started by a group of dedicated professional. The main objective of the Society is to help people initiate social change through awareness and motivation. People are divided by different forces, which develop a feeling of exploitation among major rural people. The Trust makes and efforts to bridge the gap between have and have notes by creating public opinion and demonstrations on various issues affecting the local people. Training programs are organized to give more skill and knowledge about understanding the socio economic and cultural system of the area.

ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: Providing free residential formal education with other developmental opportunities to seventy deprived girls. Six girls cured of tuberculosis, three of leprosy and two of hepatitis. Preventive test and vaccination done in all other cases. Ten girls appeared in second year Kathak and eighteen girls earned Green one belt in TAEKWANDO. Fifty poor women trained up and given placement as Home Nurses. Sixty rural women trained up in food processing, tailoring and computer screen printing.

sourceOfFunds.purpose: No Government fund received. Funds have been received from Banks, Insurance and Companies under their CSR Funding, and individuals to support differentexpenses under our main project AARUSHI, aimed at holistic development of deprived Girls. Foreign funding has been received from GSK Pharmaceuticals Ltd to support teaching expenses and has been reported in Annual FCRA return. Details of our funding and expenses are submitted every year to the State Gvt through audited statements of accounts.

No direct Government Funding. Funds have been received from Bihar State Beverage Corp, Bihar State Electronics Development Corp and Bihar State Building Construction Corp under their CSR funding. While the first two fundings have been used for construction of residential school building, the third has been used for skill development . Submitted to State Registration department through Audit reports. Foreign Funding received from GSK Pharmaceuticals for teaching expenses reported in FCRA return.

No direct Government fund received. Funds have been received from Bihar State Power Transmission Co under CSR for construction of residential school building Foreign funding has been received from GSK Pharmaceuticals Ltd to support teaching expenses and has been reported in Annual FCRA return. Banks, Insurance Company have supported towards construction of School and running expenses under project AARUSHI. Submitted to State Government Registration Dept through Audited financial Statements.

No direct Government fund received. Funds have been received from Bihar State Electronics Development Co under CSR for construction of residential school building. Funds have also been received from Bihar State Building Construction Co under CSR for skill development expenses. LIC and various private Institutions have extended support for building construction. Data will be reported, as in previous years, to Government through audited annual financial statements at the appropriate time.

Project is being implemented in District Darbhanga for Protection of street and working children. The key objective of this programme is to rescue children going for child labour, rehabilitation of other vulnerable children. Post home placement support is also being provided to children whose have been rescued from child labour so that children could be enrolled in to school and continue their education even in dearth of money.

This Project is being implemented in Bidupur block of District Vaishali, Bihar. The objective of this programme is to promote livelihood opportunities amongst rural women and capacities build them to earn more money and to live standard living. For doing this, SHG formations, distribution of seeds, plants, promotion of kitchen gardens, distribution of goats and making their sheds and other activities are going in field. In programme, we will directly form of SHGs of 3000 women

The key objective of this programme is to rescue children going for child labour, rehabilitation of other vulnerable children sensitization and formation of Child Protection Committee in block Baheri and last but not least making Darbhanga Railway station as child friendly. This apart, capacity building workshop and other activities are also being carried out. Post home placement support is also being provided to children whose have been rescued from child labour for their rehabilitation.

sourceOfFunds.purpose: NARENDRA NATH MEMORIAL TRUST IN THE YEAR 2016-17, WAS ASSIGNED BY THE DIRECTORATE OF EDUCATION NCT DELHI TO IMPART ART EDUCATION IN ITS SCHOOLS. WE CONDUCTED CLASSES IN 2 SCHOOLS: SKV NO. 1 C-BLOCK JANAKPURI AND GGSSS NO.1, TAGORE GARDEN. THE AMOUNT SANCTIONED THROUGH THE DELHI GOVT. WAS SPENT IN GIVING SALARY TO THE ARTISTS EMPLOYED BY US IN THIS PROJECT.

IN THE YEAR 2017-18, NARENDRA NATH MEMORIAL TRUST WAS ASSIGNED FIVE SCHOOLS FROM DIRECTORATE OF EDUCATION NCT DELHI. THESE WERE SKV NO.1, C-BLOCK, JANAKPURI ; SKV NO.1 SAGARPUR GGSSSS NO.1 TAGORE GARDEN SBV POOTHKALAN GCSSS MALIKPUR THE AMOUNT GRANTED BY THE GOVT WAS SPENT ON SALARY OF THE ARTISTS EMPLOYED BY US, ALONG WITH THE EXPENSES OF THEIR TRAINING, INFRASTRUCTURE OF THE TRAINING CENTRE ETC.

IN THE YEAR NARENDRA NATH MEMORIAL TRUST WAS ASSIGNED FIVE DELHI GOVT. SCHOOLS FOR SECOND CONSECUTIVE YEAR. THESE WERE SKV NO.1 C-BLOCK JANAKPURI SKV NO. 1 SAGARPUR SBV NO.1 POOTHKALAN GGSSS NO.1 TAGORE GARDEN GCSSS NO.1 MALIKPUR. THE AMOUNT RELEASED TO US WAS USED IN TRAINING AND SALARY OF THE ARTISTS EMPLOYED IN THE PROJECT ALONG WITH THE INFRASTRUCTURE AND OTHER EXPENSES OF THE CENTER.

IN THE YEAR 2019-20 , NARENDRA NATH MEMORIAL TRUST DIDNOT RECIEVE ANY GRANTS FROM GOVT UPTIL THE CURRENT DATE. HOWEVER WE ARE RUNNING OTHER TRAINING AND SKILL DEVELOPMENT PROGRAMMES IN ASSOCIATION WITH OTHR ORGANIZATIONS.

ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: Nari nidhi best practices and expriences in the field of social development In bihar nari nidhi has given visibility to the invisible womens livelihood in large numbers by promoting alternatives in the following constituencies Share croppers traditional crafts women fisher women adolescent girls and girl children and women engaged in saving and credit street vendors and home based workers We were first to work with adolescent girl We have developed programmes in healthy communities reproductive and child health adolescent reproductive and sexual health and door step education for adolescent girl barefoot marketers and issues like female feticide infanticide We were first to start the concept of Balika Kishori Chetna kendra to provide life skill education to adolescent girls and boys which has several cases resulted in raising the ege of marriage weddings without dowry We have developed modules on reproductive and child health and adolescent reproductive and sexual health and for rural adolescent which has been proved very useful for the social activists working on grassroot Nari nidhi has done massive campaign on polio eradication initiative in 3 district of bihar with the support of Unicef WHO District Health Department Project concern international Nari nidhi has done a study on situational analysis of universal birth registration and child labor We are working with 500 adolescent girls and boys on family life education and prevention of HIV AIDS We are also implemented RCH and prevention of HIV AIDS activities through our SHG members and our well skilled project staffs in five district of bihar namely Jehanabad Patna Siwan Muzaffarpur and Samastipur We have also recognized by various foreign donors Project concern international Plan india Geneva Global Rural India Supporting Trust and The Hans foundation Nari Nidhi has formed 15 Kishori groups as a peer educator to spread awareness of community people and out of school youths regarding health and hygiene life skill education More than 500 SHG benefited by thrift and credit programme SHG federation established 645 children enrolled in primary schools 559 children are advancing from lower to upper grade 1500 children participated in educational exposure trips 380 children get enrolled back in mainstream schools 35 disabled children got disability assistive devices 42 disable children participating in disability rehabilitation prog 100000 children vaccinated with OPV

ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: Parivartan mokimpur is one of the most renowned organisation of Bihar working for past 21 years at the grassroot level. A worker meets with parents of the girl and councels them towards the importance of girl education. Parivartan promote girls to complete their schooling and provides tution fees, books, uniforms and other education expenses. In return, their parents gurantee by giving a bond on simple paper, against child marriage and ensure for completion of school education till class x.

ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: Child Labour Elimination and Mainstreaming. Child labour is the curse for the society. Many children work for their bread and butter in stead of studying. Hence in order to link children with education, earning means and mainstreaming them the organization runs Child Labour Special Schools. Up till now the Organization has mainstreamed more than 1000 children through vocational training and linking them with education. More than 700 children are earning by dint of the vocational training taken.

sourceOfFunds.purpose: The project was monitored locally. This project was meant to rehabilitate child labours through Child Labour Special schools. In these schools students were provided education, health check up, mid day meal, vocational training in order to rehabilitate them to lead a dignified life. The schools were operational within the habitate of children. All the surveyed students were enrolled in these schools in order to mainstream them and a way to provide them a dignified life. Stop child labour quickly

The purpose of this project was nothing but to promote exclusive breastfeeding and IYCF. A breastfeeding resource cum counselling centre was established in order to make aware the community about the importance of exclusive breastfeeding, continue breastfeeding , introduction of complimentary feeding. The community was also made aware about technique to prepare food as per their need. Community meeting and street play was also performed in the project area. Promote breastfeeding and care child.

Kala azar is a fatal disease in Bihar and many people die off this disease. There are about one dozen kalazar affected districts in Bihar where a lots of programmes are being launced in order to eradicate kala azar. Samastipur is one of the districts where the prevalence of kala azr is a curse for the people of this district. Under this project awareness generation was created in order to mobilize the community against this dreaded disease. The patients were mobilized to go satellite centre

Evaluation Directorate is associated with Planning and development department of BHihar. Associated with this department the organization prepared study evaluation of Sabla scheme of ICDS, Bihar, Mukhyamantri Mahadali Radio scheme and Rogi Kalyan Samiti. From one dozen ditricts of Bihar data were collected and elaborated study evaluation report was prepared and entrusted to the funding department as a mean to analyse the ongoing schemes and bring changes if necessary. It helps in implementation

sourceOfFunds.purpose: Agriculture Main livelihood sources of India, PKVS worked with International Rice Research Institute (IRRI) in Bihar. We promote Swarna Sub-1 seed in flood areas. Swarna Sub-1 paddy has capacity to sink in flood 15 days gives around one quintal. Prabhat Kiran Vikash Sansthan had demonstration Swarna Sub-1 Paddy in Katra and Aurai Blocks with aroun 1000 thousands famers in Muzaffarpur District in Bihar. We got great results in both blocks. Wastage lands ( In Flood) become gives farmers yields..
